Ueli

Created an attachment (id=61553)
Screenshot of property unselection

I cannot reproduce this error. 

Steps reproduced:
1) Open an UML2 project (the UML2 example)
2) Open openArchitectureWare preferences page
3) Unselect UML2 Profiles contributor
4) Close preference dialog
(no error)
5) Open again prefernce page
6) Select UML2 profiles contributor
7) Save and close preferences
